content.rendered:
I stand as an Independent Candidate with 30 years of policing experience and 10 years of business experience.

I have no allegiance to any political party. My allegiance is to the community of Wiltshire.

I will challenge your local police service and hold the Chief Constable to account.

I will seek to help community support groups and improve community services.

I will serve you with

  • Honesty
  • Integrity
  • Transparency

I will listen and be your voice in policing.

I will work for you, the people of Wiltshire to do the right thing for you. 

Promoted by Mukesh Shah, 15 Stanier Street, Swindon, Wiltshire SN1 5QU on behalf of Mike Rees.
